snippet: Alex Avila got a present of sorts, indirectly from his father, and will host a celebration this weekend with his family minus any potential baseball-related drama....
lead_paragraph: Alex Avila got a present of sorts, indirectly from his father, and will host a celebration this weekend with his family minus any potential baseball-related drama.

headline.main: Tigers Bring Back Catcher Alex Avila With $2M, 1-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Tigers Bring Back Catcher Alex Avila With $2M, 1-Year Deal
